tasks.task_description: Analyze marketplace project structure and authentication flow
Examine FAISS app authentication and tier detection logic
Identify where tier=pro should be passed from marketplace to FAISS
Test current authentication flow between both apps
Implement proper fix in CDK stack
Deploy and validate the fix works end-to-end

description: Root cause analysis and fix for tier=pro not being passed from marketplace to FAISS app
context: Found the root cause! The FAISS UI correctly extracts tier parameter from URL (line 247: tier: urlParams.get('tier')) and stores it (line 318: localStorage.setItem('marketplace_tier', marketplaceTier || '')). The issue is that the marketplace catalog is NOT passing the tier=pro parameter when generating the URL to FAISS. The catalog Lambda only returns static solution metadata with externalUrl: https://awssolutionfinder.solutions.cloudnestle.com/search - no authentication parameters are added.
